1.content:
You have been shrunken down to 3 inches tall. The person who did this to you has taken you back to their home where they have an assortment of dogs waiting for a new treat. As you enter the house, you see the dogs rush their master for a lookxat their new toy.
"Ah ah ah, wait. The toy chooses its first master."
The dogs sit and look to their owner, he opens his hand and shows you the dogs.
"Take your pick."
You hesitantly look about, you pick a...
1.title: Shrunk

11.content:
You are deposited before the Dachsond.
"Bit of a fast one, no use running."
You stare at the Dachsond, he snarls at you, his teeth show and spit dribbles from them. You ponder if you might be able to escape.
11.title: Dachsond

111.content: The dog laps you up, you enter its mouth, you try and climb out of its mouth but have your chest caught in its teeth. You try and push past but you are caught tight. The dog starts walking to...
111.title: You stay

choices: Put you back in his mouth
112.content: You attempt to run, when the dogs feet start bounding after you. His teeth close around you as he picks you up. He brings you up the stairs of the house to a room. In the corner he drops you, he decides to...
112.title: You run(Caught)

choices: Get out and look at the dog

1122.title: Put you back in his mouth

11221.content: You manage to pull yourself from the dogs mouth. He is sound asleep, you make your way to the door, you...
11221.title: Try and escape

112211.content: You turn to see the dog looking ar you, as he starts getting up, you run. You bolt out the door and spot a closet, you run for it whe you get in you push the door closed, but the Dachsond gets its muzzle in. You push back on the door but its no use, you decide to...
112211.title: Wake the dog, oops

1122111.content: You see spit fly from the dogs mouth, the door opens more each second, you decide that you won't be leaving here, and let go of the door. The dog bursts in, you are flung to the ground and look up at the dog, it is snarling at you, it picks you up down the middle, legs coming out the sides of his mouth, you beat at his muzzle, dealing no damage to the creature. You notice where he is taking you and you don't like it...
1122111.title: Throw yourself to his jaws

11221112.content: The dog is taking you back to his corner, you feel his tongue work its way up your back. You are being tilted upwards now and you feel as you start sliding until you stop, yoir legs are still outside of the dogs muzzle. The warm wet tongue starts working around you, you grab onto the dogs nose, and hope for the best as the tongue starts trying to pull you in. The dog tilts his nose down, letting you slide out of his mouth, then flicks upward. You fly through the air and come down...
11221112.title: Back to his corner

1122112.content: You push against the door, his jaws snap and send drool everywhere. You run and duck behind a box, then the dog bursts in, he looks around the closet snarling. You look up to his face and see his teeth baring, his eyes prowling. You duck behind the box again.
1122112.title: Try to hide

11221121.content: You hide behind the box as the snarling muzzle comes near your hiding spot, you shiver in fear as it sniffs around. Suddenly, your hiding place is tipped over, the dog is snarling at you, you look ar the giant muzzle right infront of you. You...
11221121.title: You are found

112212.content: You get past the doorxand to the stairs. You clumsily make your way down the stairs. You get to the bottom of the stairs and there lays a rottweiler. His heavy head is on the step, you think you might be able to jump over him down to the bottom. You...
112212.title: Make it past

1122121.content: You walk back, once you are as far back on the steps as possible, you sprint forward and jump. As you fly through the air, you land in a crash on the dogs side, wakening the Rottweiler. Uh oh...
1122121.title: Try to jump him

11221212.content: You stay there, realising you are already screwed. The dog stands up, and as he does you fall to the floor. The dogs big head lowers at you, growling. You back away, but large teeth clamp down on your legs, you writhe and try and get out but your efforts are fruitless. The dog thrashes his head side to side, you are knocked unconcious.
11221212.title: Stay there

choices: You decide not to and climb back up the stairs
1122122.content: You approach the dog and admire its sleek black fur, his teeth, sharp and white, glistening with saliva. You feel its breath lightly pushing you. You almost feel the need to be in that dogs mouth with that dog...
1122122.title: Examine the dog

11222.content: You decide to play it safe and stay in his mouth. His teeth are on top of you, and the occasional drool drips on you, but you feel okay. Stroking his muzzle as he sleeps, you notice another dog enter, its...
11222.title: Stay in the dogs mouth

113.content: You bolt, the dog chases suit, but the owner stops him. Whyxis he helping me you wonder, then it hits you. You see the Saint Bernard lower its head and lap you up. Spit covers you as you enter his mouth. He promptly swallows you. You die in the acids of his stomach.
113.title: You run(Escape)

12.content: You are placed infront of the dogs face. He opens his mouth and breathes heavily onto you. You try to hide your face as his slobbery tongue emerges. He slurps you into his mouth where you feel him moving. You attempt to stand but slip on his drool. You start slipping down his throught what do you do?
12.title: Saint Bernard

121.content: You hold the tooth, and hang there, inside the smelly wet cave. The dog opens his mouth and you fall out into some dirt. You look up at the dog, he slowly descends to...
121.title: Grab his tooth

1211.content: He lays down ontop of you, his tremendous weight pinning you to the ground. You are stuck under his chest, and no light is visible. You start crawling, you hardly move under the gerth of the large dog. You mange to wiggle out...
1211.title: Lay on you

1212.content:
The huge mound of fur lays infront of you. He breathes through his nose now, and you reach forward and touch it. The nose is wet and cold. You stroke the dog.
"Good boy." You praise as you pet more of his muzzle.
The large dogs mouth opens and his tail wags. He enjoys you petting him! As you pet him he pants more vogorously, until you are barely standing as the horrid, hit breath blasts you. You...
1212.title: Lay infront of you

1213.content:
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/XEWVoCpjGvE/maxre...

You look in fear as this big giant pink tongue comes out. You watch in horror as the dog’s tongue gets closer and closer and closer. There’s no where do you to run because you are stuck in the dirt. And then the hot rough pink tongue touches you. And then the dog stops licking you and looks down on you. You can almost see smirk as his mouth slowly consumes you. You smell his horrible hot breath and you watch as the sene slowly fades away and all you can see in your dogs wet and gross cave. You wonder how long you will be stuck in here. Will you get swallowed or will he spit you out
1213.title: Lick you

He stands there above you, wagging his tail and happy. Drool drips down onto your face, and everywhere. The dog lays down and drags you close to his stomach. You...
122.title: Grab his tongue

123.content: You let yourself slip down the gullet of the beast, you feel his muscles push you downwards as his saliva coats you even more. You are halfway down his throught when...
123.title: Let yourself fall

13.content:
You picked the English Bull Terrier.
"Ah, hes a rough one." Your captor cackles as he places you on your back on the dogs nose. You can feel the dog breathing, the slight movement of the muzzle upxand down. You...
13.title: English Bull Terrier

131.content: You lay there, you see the other dogs stare enviously at the Bull Terrier. Suddenly you hear your captor give a command, the dog flips you into the air a bit, then chomps down on your center. The dog whips his head side to side, and you feel disoriented as the slobber coats you. You feel his tongue grip you firmly. You try and fight against the dog. He proceeds to chew on you as you walk away to his little corner. He...
131.title: Lay there

1311.content: You feel the teeth grind into your flesh, he lays down and chews for a long time, you stroke his muzzle as you are chewed, but soon loose energy. You lay limp as he places you between his paws, and goes to sleep. You use this time to...
1311.title: Chews more

13111.content: The dog is sleeping on his back, your legs hang from his front as his tongue covers your torso. You scoot your way out, you now stand infront of the dog, fast asleep. You make your way past his paws, and walk towards the door of the room. As you walk you approach the exit, and there infront of you is the hall towards the door. You are flooded with joy, but then you see a Malamute, Great Dane, and Rottweiler all sleeping in the hall way. You decide...
13111.title: Try and escape

131111.content:
You turn around and see a giant foot. Your captor stands above you.
"Trying to escape, ah, ah, ah. You really thought that would work?"
You don't answer. You are placed inxa cage, you stay there until morning, when your captor takes you out and you are placed on a platform. You look down to see the dogs ravenously staring at you. You turn around to see your captor push you off. You fall freely to the dogs. You land on the Great Danes nose, you then tumble down to the Dachsond who bites at your legs, then the St. Bernard gets an arm. Then a Mastiff gets your other arm. You look at your captor who...
131111.title: To go back

131112.content: You decide to keep going, throwing caution to the wind, you approach the first big dog, the Great Dane. You walk forward, the dogs nose twitching, you watch as it opens its mouth wide, exposing its long pink tongue, and its sharp teeth. It is...
131112.title: Keep trekking

1311121.content: You keep walking and stay in front of the Rottweiler. You could keep going or try to wake him up
1311121.title: Still asleep

1312.content: The dog falls asleep, you crawl out of his mouth and onto his body, you walk on his side, laying down on the fur and listening to his heart. You keep walking, when suddenly...

The dog gets closer to you, and has you pinned to a wall with his nose, the wet nose starts turning up, he is lifting you. You feel yoursel going higher until the dogs neck is almost at a 90 degree angle. You wonder whats happening, when the dogs lips move away, his jaws are slowly moving away. You...
13121.title: He wakes up

"Good choice, loves to play fetch."
You start to regret your choice as you go outside, the man picks you up, and throws you. The Mastiff follows close behind, you haven't neared the ground when you feel his jaws clamp down on your legs. Your torso hangs out and you fall with the dog. He runs toxa corner of the yard and...

141.title: Chews you vigorously

142.title: Places you on his belly

1512.content:

You land right on his hot pink tongue. It’s very rough. It has a small line in the middle. You smell his very hot and nasty breath and then a piece of left over food drops from the top of his mouth and lands on you. You are now stuck to the Rottweiler‘s tongue and you can’t move. You watch in horror as his mouth starts to close slowly. Will this be you prison. Will you be stuck inside the Rottweiler‘s mouth forever. You start to wonder but then all of the sudden his tongue starts to wiggle you around. Will you...
1512.title: In the mouth

choices: Try to climb the Malamute! Maybe it can carry you outside.
Keep on talking to further soothe the big dog!
154.content:
The white and gray Alaskan Malamute easily is the largest of the dogs in front of you. However, while most other dogs seem overly excited and more than voracious, the Malamute appears to be in a predominately curious, yet calm mood. With a trembling hand you point at the large canine, while your heart sinks to your boots. Without any further comments, you're drawn in front of the huge dog's face and held in front of its nose. The animal happily sniffs you with its black snout, before starting to pant. You feel the hot breath steaming out of its mouth, warming your lower legs and feet. Suddenly, you're brought towards the ground, while the dog's snout follows your body's movement. After a few seconds, you lie on the ground, the Malamute still breathing over you. From your angle, you can easily view the pink insides of the maw, the sharp canines and the gullet. After another quick sniff, the big tongue slowly moves towards you, giving you a careful, gigantic lick. Some of the Malamute's drool sticks on your tiny body.

"N-No, please, don't..."

Although the faint and fragile tone of your voice, the big canine notices your distress and slightly cocks its head. It almost seems like the creature doesn't mean to scare or harm you. Meanwhile, the person who shrunk you down has left the room, and most of the other dogs seem to have joined them. Still in deadly terror, you try to decide your next move.
154.title: Malamute

155.content: You are placed infront of the enormous dog. He looks down at you, then lowers his head, he lightly holds you between his teeth, then flings you to the air. You scream and flail as you see the dog ready with an open mouth. You are caught in his teeth and placed on the ground. Your arms go beneath his paws and he starts licking you. You...
155.title: Great Dane

choices: It wants to have you for itself.
It loves to share its new toy!
1553.content:
Unable to free yourself, you kick your legs as the gigantic tongue presses you to the ground. As the pink muscle lifts off your body again, you instantly start screaming at the top of your lungs, not thinking about whether this is a reasonable move.

"Help! HELP ME! Please! He's gonna eat me!"

To your surprise, the great Dane seems somewhat startled by the strange sound of your distressed voice, hence the licking ceases momentarily. However, it also seems to awake interest of the other dogs in the room. Still pinned down, you watch in dread as multiple dogs start to approach you. Some of them panting, some of them cocking their heads, but all of them immensely curious about you. They tower above you, their eyes locked on your tiny body. You stare back in horror at most of the dogs you had seen before, like the Rottweiler, the Malamute, Labrador, and it seems like even more have entered the room, like a Samoyed and a Bernese Mountain Dog.

As the Great Dane lowers its snout again, more dogs join in, and quickly, you're surrounded by muzzles all around you. You gasp at the dozen enormous dog noses, most of them sniffing you intently. The warm breath of all the canines quickly heats you up. Suddenly, a tongue flicks out and swiftly licks your head, followed by another tongue brushing your feet. Holding your breath, you get ready for more intense licks. But foremost, you hear a grunt coming from the Great Dane, which is still keeping you in place with its paws.
1553.title: Surrounded by Dogs

info.brief_description: You were shrunken to just a couple inches tall, and are being used as a dog toy.
info.description: First interactive, just want to make sure, if you add on please be descriptive, nothing naughty.
